content:
Biography#Hello! I’m Kanjuu (æŸ‘æ©˜) from China. My homepage serves primarily as a platform to showcase the technologies and research areas I am interested in, along with sharing aspects of my life. You are welcome to find my LinkedIn profile on the Top Page for a detailed view of my rÃ©sumÃ©.
I am proficient in common algorithms and data structures, and I can program fluently using multiple languages and development environments. Furthermore, I have a rapid learning ability and cross-disciplinary adaptability, which allows me to manage complex projects effectively, alongside good resilience to pressure and efficient multi-task management skills.
Education/AcademicB.Eng. in Building Electrical and Intelligence, Xi’An University of Architecture and Technology, 2026 Exchange Student of the International Summer School, The Hong Kong Polytechnic University, 2023 AwardsLanqiao Cup Competition, C/C++ Programming Group: Second Prize (National Final), 2023/06 China Collegiate Computing Contest - Group Programming Ladder Tournament (GPLT): Second Prize (Shaanxi Regional Team Competition), Successful Participation Award (National Final), 2023/05 Projects2023/06-2024/04, A Blockchain-Based Intelligent IoT Collaboration Control System (National Undergraduate Training Program for Innovation and Entrepreneurship, ID. 202310703039). Registered a software copyright (No. 2024SR0786441). Technology Stack#C/C++ Python MATLAB Web front-end Certification#Performance Agent Certificate (Ministry of Culture and Tourism, PRC) AOPA Civil Remote Pilot Certificate
